original_title: Elle a passé tant d'heures sous les sunlights...
overview: A young film director is turning a movie with his friend Christa. In the film-within-the-film there are two couples, one real, one imagined , and the film - told through five dreams - is as much the story of a film on-production, as the birth of a child.
title: She Spent So Many Hours Under the Sun Lamps
